description:
Updated on 13 Jan 16- Added more EIGRP Labs and it's for YOU only

This course is going to tell you the ways you can improve your skills while working or operating Cisco Routers and Switches. It lists most of the Human errors or mistakes that people have made in their careers.

Students will become more aware about very small mistakes which can cause outages in network environment.

I have included GNS3 Real time sessions in all chapters so to make things very much clear.

This course has been divided in to 9 lectures + 10 Bonus lectures- Students who have basic understanding will be able to learn a lot from this course.

In case you want to enhance your career and improve your troubleshooting skills then this is definitely for you.

This course will help you reduce outages or loss of connectivity while you work on devices.

Here is some of the feedback my previous courses received

Jason Martinez -Troubleshooting Internet Connection Problems

Ashish gives a good outline of how to troubleshoot common problems users experience. A good intro of problem types and error descriptions --provides a logical steps of how to detect the issue and how to resolve them. Highly recommend anyone who uses the net to take this course and get a basic troubleshooting guide to solve simple issues. Why pay a PC Technician when you can resolve the issue yourself?! Double thumbs up! Thanks Ashish!

Ernst Chan - Great Course! Solid Troubleshooting Skills for Home & SOHO Networks.

Petru Lucian Giurca -It was interesting and educated especially if you are a beginner with the internet. Thank you Sir!

Cesar De Haro-This is a great course

Currently I am studying for the CCNA and this is a very useful course for it, the instructor is an expert. He is providing very clear explications about the covered topics.

Thomas Meugniot - Great -This was very helpful in understanding RCA in IT infrastructure.
title: Never-To-Do mistakes in Networks for CCNA CCNP students
